summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: user-facing labels are updated to “Track Order” in header/hero/footer and the tracking section headline/title is updated; homepage section order is Pricing -> Free Quote -> Track section with scroll targets still pointing to the tracking section. However, the diff also includes several unrelated UI/style/pricing changes that were not requested and may violate stated non-goals (e.g., pricing tier changes).

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to pricing tiers/turnaround times/features in the ServiceTiersSection.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states as a non-goal: “Do not change pricing tiers or quote form fields/validation logic.” The diff summary indicates pricing tier content was updated.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/color palette updates (new OKLCH red/white palette) and button/success color changes in the contact form.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; scope was only renaming “Track Package” to “Track Order” and reordering sections.

hallucinated_features.description: Logo sizing/cropping behavior changes via .logo-square updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; unrelated to renaming/reordering.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated base-path-aware static asset URL helper (assetUrl) and updated hero to use it; plus introduction/reference of a new logo asset.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; unrelated to renaming/reordering.

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind configuration updates (custom tokens, typography, animations, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; unrelated to renaming/reordering.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/altered tracking UI functionality and additional tracking/query hooks (useTrackingQueries) beyond simple renaming/reordering.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goals include not changing backend tracking behavior. While the diff summary can’t prove backend behavior changed, it does show new/expanded frontend tracking logic not required to satisfy REQ-1/REQ-2.
